Package trueshuffle.model

Class UserLibrary

java.lang.Object
trueshuffle.model.UserLibrary
public class UserLibrary extends Object
Thread-safe class that encapsulates a Spotify user's library.

    • getMostRecentPlaylists

      public List<se.michaelthelin.spotify.model_objects.specification.PlaylistSimplified> getMostRecentPlaylists(int limit) throws FatalRequestResponse
      Retrieve the most recently played/created playlists.
      Parameters:
      limit - The maximum number of playlists to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A shallow copy of the underlying playlists.
      Throws:
      FatalRequestResponse

    • getPlaylistById

      public ShufflePlaylist getPlaylistById(String playlistId) throws FatalRequestResponse
      Retrieve a playlist by its unique identifier. This can be a public, user private or collaborative playlist. Private playlists from other users cannot be retrieved.
      Parameters:
      playlistId - The id of the playlist.
      Returns:
      The playlist identified by the provided id.
      Throws:
      FatalRequestResponse

    • getPlaylistByName

      public List<ShufflePlaylist> getPlaylistByName(String playlistName, boolean isOwner) throws FatalRequestResponse
      Retrieves a playlist from the index by its name
      Parameters:
      playlistName - The playlist name to search for
      isOwner - Whether we should only include playlists that are owned by the current user
      Throws:
      FatalRequestResponse

    • createPlaylist

      public ShufflePlaylist createPlaylist(String name, String description) throws FatalRequestResponse
      Creates a new playlist for the user with provided name and description.
      Parameters:
      name - Then name of the new playlist.
      description - The description of the new playlist.
      Returns:
      The newly created playlist.
      Throws:
      FatalRequestResponse
